description: Get your green on with this broccoli gnocchi coated in a moreish tomato and garlic sauce. Try this impressive dish at your next alfresco feast.
keywords: Broccoli Gnocchi With Roasted Tomato & Garlic Sauce
name: Broccoli Gnocchi With Roasted Tomato & Garlic Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil over mediumhigh heat. Add gnocchi and peas, then cook for 2 minutes or until gnocchi floats to surface. Using a slotted spoon, transfer gnocchi and peas to tomato mixture and add lemon juice and 2 tbs cooking liquid. Toss to combine. Divide gnocchi mixture among bowls and top with basil, parmesan and almonds. Season with pepper. Serve.
